body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Michael Phillips and the customer's name is Janice Ross.  The conversation is about MetaCar (a Car Rental Agency ) and is a conversation about customer service.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Michael Phillips, and I represent MetaCar, your reliable car rental agency.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Janice! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling a bit frustrated with my recent reservation.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I apologize for the inconvenience, Janice. Could you please provide me with your reservation number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's two five three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information. In addition, could you also share your email address for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect! Thank you for sharing that, Janice. I will look into the issue with your reservation right away.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! Thank you for your patience. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that should be all for now.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! Thank you for your time, Janice. Have a wonderful day!
